cilantro.protocol.proofs.pow.sha module¶

This is the basic SHA3 POW check implementation in cilantro. It acts as a check on incoming transactions to act as an anti-spam measure

Available classes: -SHA3POW: This class implements find and check static methods which generate viable POW solutions
